hypothesis: If perturbation improved score by +0.0079 on 25% temporal config (1.1373 -> 1.1452), applying it to W2's better 40% temporal config (1.1688) could yield even higher scores.

w2_40pct_temporal.config: 40% temporal, sigma 0.18/0.22, 8 NM polish, NO perturbation

configs_to_test.name: baseline_combo
configs_to_test.rationale: Direct combination of W2 config + best perturbation params

configs_to_test.name: reduced_polish_for_budget
configs_to_test.rationale: If baseline combo is over budget, reduce NM polish to 6

configs_to_test.name: more_perturbations
configs_to_test.rationale: If time budget allows, try perturbing top 2 candidates
